title: Quarantine Free Download
description:
Get Quarantine for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The main game cycle of Quarantine is to use a taxi equipped with weapons to pick up passengers, deliver packages and defeat enemies. Between missions, the player replenishes the taxi’s ammunition and armor by visiting gas stations, marked on the player’s map. Missions send the player through the various districts of Kemo City.
Progression from zone to zone is blocked by password protected gates until the player has completed enough story missions to advance. The quarantine required quite a powerful system when it was released. One of the original advertisements in the gaming magazines used the slogan “If you have the ram, we have the pawns”. Quarantine, long before Grand Theft Auto III and other similar games,
